means: （偏离平衡位置的）一次性往复振动

word_mean: 振动疗法：摇动身体疗法
物体经过它的平衡位置所作的往复运动或某一物理量在其平衡值附近的来回变动。

sentence.Network_en: The amplitude of the vibration determines the loudness of the sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 振动幅度的大小决定声音的大小.

sentence.Network_en: There is so much vibration on a ship that one cannot write.
sentence.Network_cn: 船上的震动大得使人无法书写.

sentence.Network_en: The vibration of the window woke me up.
sentence.Network_cn: 窗子的震动把我惊醒了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin vibratio(n-), from the verb vibrare (see vibrate)

entry.def: If something vibrates or if you vibrate it, it shakes with repeated small, quick movements.

example.ex: The ground shook and the cliffs seemed to vibrate...
example.tran: 大地在摇晃，悬崖好像在颤动。

means.word_mean: 2. a distinctive emotional atmosphere; sensed intuitively;

sentences.sentence: "the shaking of his fingers as he lit his pipe"

means.word_mean: 4. (physics) a regular periodic variation in value about a mean

auth_sentence.content: It refers to the natural vibration of the universe.
auth_sentence.res_content: It refers to the natural vibration of the universe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It refers to the natural vibration of the universe.

auth_sentence.content: Laser surgery stiffens the palate to reduce vibration.
auth_sentence.res_content: Laser surgery stiffens the palate to reduce vibration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Laser surgery stiffens the palate to reduce vibration.

auth_sentence.content: What separates atomic from universal vibration is duration and visibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: What separates atomic from universal vibration is duration and visibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What separates atomic from universal vibration is duration and visibility.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 振动的,明快的,生气勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vibr摇摆+ant……的→振动的,有活力的
vibrate摇摆+ion表名词→n.颤动,振动;摆动
re再次+vibrate[v.[使]振动,[使]摇摆;受…而感动]→再次震动
vibr摇摆+ate表动词→v.[使]振动,[使]摇摆;受…而感动

sentences.en: Vibration displaced part of the mechanism.
sentences.cn: 部分机械装置因受震动而移位了。

sentences.en: Their instruments can detect the slightest vibration.
sentences.cn: 他们的仪器能探测出极微弱的震动。

sentences.en: The vibration of the window woke me up.
sentences.cn: 窗子的震动把我惊醒了。

sentences.en: I am drawn to that girl; I get good vibrations from her.
sentences.cn: 我被那女孩吸引住了,她使我产生良好的感觉。
